TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerRegistryBlobClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Azure Container Registry blob client, responsible for uploading and downloading blobs and manifests, the building blocks of artifacts.

Docs.param: The URI endpoint of the container registry. This is likely to be similar to "https://{registry-name}.azurecr.io".
The name of the repository that logically groups the artifact parts.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the for managing container images and artifacts, using anonymous access to the registry. Only operations that support anonymous access are enabled. Other service methods will throw if called from this client.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the or is null.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.Response<Azure.Containers.ContainerRegistry.Specialized.DownloadBlobResult> DownloadBlob (string digest, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Containers.ContainerRegistry.Specialized.DownloadBlobResult> DownloadBlob(string digest, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

abstract member DownloadBlob : string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Containers.ContainerRegistry.Specialized.DownloadBlobResult> override this.DownloadBlob : string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Containers.ContainerRegistry.Specialized.DownloadBlobResult>

Docs.param: The digest of the blob to download.
The cancellation token to use.
Docs.summary: Download an artifact blob. This API is a prefered way to fetch blobs that can fit into memory. The content is provided as that provides a lightweight abstraction for a payload of bytes. It provides convenient helper methods to get out commonly used primitives, such as streams, strings, or bytes. To download a blob that does not fit in memory, please use the method instead.
